# awesome-no-restricted-syntax

[no-restricted-syntax](https://eslint.org/docs/rules/no-restricted-syntax) rules for ESLint.

## Awesome Rules

<!-- RULES_START -->
- [use-tostring-instead-of-template](./rules/use-tostring-instead-of-template.js) [ðŸ¤–](https://eslint.org/play/#) - Use `.toString()` instead of template literal if you want to convert a value to string.
- [wave-dash-full-width-tilde](./rules/wave-dash-full-width-tilde.js) [ðŸ¤–](https://eslint.org/play/#) - Full-width tilde and wave dash are easily confused<!-- RULES_END -->
